assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Emily Pond and Rebecca Dimond declare that they have no conflict of interest.All procedures followed were in accordance with the ethical standards of the responsible committee on human experimentation (institutional and national) and with the Helsinki Declaration of 1975, as revised in 2000 (5).

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Informed consent was obtained from all individual participants included in the study.
